channel.title: (317) NewGenPkz (317) - Awesomely coded
channel.description:
Before You Read we had a namechange from pk4life to NewGenPkz
Hi its Mursanari here. my mate tyler and i started a server 3 weeks a go . but we where faced with a dilemma of not having a hoster. 2 weeks passed and then tyler said to me lets start up PK4LIFE again. So i said sure then i got to coding. We are using Edge Pkz source
I have made the forums but they could improve - NewGenPkz.tk how we will communicate: we will use either hamachi or msn to talk we will have a discussion daily about what we have done and what we want done . if ur a coder u will use a handy program called dropbox wich u can learn about and download here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,368114.0.html
we are looking for the following:
server coder - Mursanari server coder - pkerA server coder - (open)
hoster - pkerA
web designer - Mursanari web designer 2 - (open ) web designer 3 - (open )
client coder - (open) client coder - (open)
picture/logo maker - (open)
i dont expect all spots to be filled .
What we hope on adding
Working autocast - (not added) new staffzone - (not added) new pvp exchange shop - (not added) Event zone - (not added) fun pk - (not added) new donatorzone - (not added) 508 character models - (not added) better cc system - (not added) pk god armor - (not added) working prayer - (half added) more donator equipment - (sort of added) fixed female characters - (not yet added) npc dialogue to the NewGenPkz tutor - not yet added
Thats basically it ill tell u what i have added.
working anti syipkpker system tutorial island yell rank system log in title system new donator shop donator cape dontor body and donator legs 4 hit claw spec proper gs stances proper gs specs vengence holyjordyn npc - i hate that guy fish stall gives fish faster thieving sexier home layout proper lunar hd water a few commands (cause i was bored)
the reasone for this source: ive seen many servers with this source and they all have had 50 + players and demise is an awesome coder so yer
if we can achieve this : if we get all of what i want done like the autocast this server will be top-dog and we will have over 50 players wich is quite an achievment for my first ever server
what will we do with donations : all first donations will go towards a VPS or dedi. then after we have that we will stock up for a better one. once we have that we will split all donations evenly between us.
Why we will have over 50 people : tyler (the other owner ) and i have all got friends believe it or not. and our friends have friends. we currently have 12 people confirmed that there gonna join when the server is online. so that essentianlly means that we will have heaps of people online in the first day. we have a person that is friends with someone that owns an advertising website + we have 3 recruiters standing bye for when the server comes online ben,tyler,aerous6 .
other plans :
our plans for donations are $1 for a customized log in name and yell rank $10 for donator status $15 dollars for mod (u need to have played for atleast 4 days and not broken any rules) thats all for donations so far.
plans for advertising :
we gonna hit private server top lists hard. well start off bye telling our friends then well goto moparscape and then paste on the status page then head onto google paste our status on there . then we will goto youtube deploy our premade movies on youtube then we will head on to rs-ps.org and advertise there. so by the end of the first day we will have basically covered every rsps site out there. then we will have over 20 people by the end of the first week.
getting vote plans : for every vote you do u recieve 50 mill and/or 50pkp this will get our economy going .
pics : logo [img]http://img32.imageshack.us/img32/4528/bannerredv.png[/img]
ags spec [img]http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/531/agsspec.jpg[/img]
edited home [img]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/5679/editedhome.jpg[/img]
veng [img]http://img85.imageshack.us/img85/3163/vengy.jpg[/img]
donatorshop (not yet complete) [img]http://img248.imageshack.us/img248/5656/donatorshop.jpg[/img]
flying [img]http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/87/flyingk.jpg[/img]
chaos ele [img]http://img40.imageshack.us/img40/5973/chaosele.jpg[/img]
so thats about it theres more added
if u would like to be a part of this then please follow this table :
name/gaming name: job wanted : reason : email/msn: experience with wanted job : other:
Thank you very much :) best of wishes , if u have any more questions private message me or add me on msn : mursanari1@hotmail.com

item.title: (317) NewGenPkz (317) - Awesomely coded
item.dc:creator: @mursanari mursanari
item.description:
@mursanari wrote:

please post how it is unorginized and then quote the unorganized bits and then go off and fix urs . before u go off and post on mine.
hmm u see how my spots are filling up at the top i go to urs wich has been in this longer and yet only the owner spot is filled. mmm idk

and how is it unorganized ill tell u what i have done

title
background information
what i have added
what i want added
what the plans for the server is
and some pictures

ur is
title
staff posistions
random unnesesary picture
a paragraph of info
welldone u diserver and award.

experience with wanted job : Hoster ehm no experience i just can host, Coding: I have been coding for 18months!
other: NOTHING[/quote]

accepted but it would be really handy if u could be on msn cause the other owner doesnt have moparscape

I can code, be a forum maker, and also I can make you a picture/logo.

kk accepted u can help adjust the current forums (or make a sexier forums ) and code i will send u and email

@mursanari wrote:

Before You Read
we had a namechange from pk4life to NewGenPkz

Hi its Mursanari here.
my mate tyler and i started a server 3 weeks a go . but we where faced with a dilemma of not having a hoster. 2 weeks passed and then tyler said to me lets start up PK4LIFE again.
So i said sure then i got to coding.
We are using Edge Pkz source

I have made the forums but they could improve - NewGenPkz.tk

ive seen many servers with this source and they all have had 50 + players and demise is an awesome coder so yer

if we get all of what i want done like the autocast this server will be top-dog and we will have over 50 players wich is quite an achievment for my first ever server

all first donations will go towards a VPS or dedi.
